name: Ludo Chat
description:
Ludo Chat aims to provide you cross platform (Android and Desktop) multiplayer experience with Friends and Family.
Ludo is derived from the game of Parchisi where the rules are still same but you play with the dices.

This game is ad supported and we've tried to keep the balance of game time and ads you're being shown. Playing and chatting is completely free. Winning a match will earn you in game currency which will unlock different Google Play Achievements.
Do check out leaderboards to see where you stand among other players and friends.

Features :
Voice Chat (Completely FREE!)
Text Chat
Public Rooms and Challenge Strangers
Private Room for playing with Friends or Family
User Friendly UI with no unnecessary option
Pure Gaming
Supported Low End Mobiles

Download for mobile
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ShiftEscape.LudoChat
